alert.note: Alert for Central Interior; Upper Chena River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 19 at 4:32PM AKST until November 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT MONDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River, Upper Chena River Valley and Central Interior. * WHEN...From midnight Monday night to 6 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Reductions in visibility from blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recent snowfall is expected to be blown around from these gusty winds and result in rapid reductions in visibility on area roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior; Upper Chena River Valley; White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
